numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In all sports except baseball, most players are colored people.
3. In all sports leagues, most head coaches are non-colored people.
4. In all leagues, the number of colored players is significantly higher than the number of colored head coaches.
5. I wonder why the percentage of colored players is much higher than the percentage of colored head coaches.
6. I wonder why the percentage of colored players in the MLB is lower than the percentage of colored players in other leagues.
7. I ask whether baseball is a sport that colored people play less.
8. I wonder why colored people get fewer head-coach positions than player positions.
9. This situation impacts my community positively.
11. Many colored people can play sports professionally.
12. This situation also impacts me negatively.
13. This situation also impacts my community negatively.
14. The graph indicates that few colored people are allowed to be a head coach.
15. The title is: Colored people are mostly the majority among players, but why not among head coaches?
